title: LG tipped for Nexus duties as Google visits Korean HQ | Trusted Reviews
description: ![LG Logo]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Recent rumours suggested that Huawei [would be handling thesmartphone](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/google-s-next-nexus-to-use-huawei-chip-not-snapdragon), which would land as the Chinese company’s firstNexus device.That would leave LG manufacturing the tablet, which would also be a newventure for the firm, having never produced a Nexus tablet.LG has worked on Nexus devices before, however, having produced both the[Nexus 4](https://www.trustedreviews.com/google-nexus-4-review) and [Nexus5](https://www.trustedreviews.com/google-nexus-5-review) smartphones.Motorola and HTC made the most recent devices, specifically the [Nexus 6smartphone](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-6-review) and [Nexus 9tablet](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-9-review). Both were met withlukewarm critical reception.LG’s Nexus smartphones however, were very well received, so perhaps Google iseyeing up the firm to make a new smartphone and restore consumer faith in theNexus line.
